column5: I have the same pair , but I use them for something else. . They do the trick and clean up well with isopropanol .

Joey, Really valid point . We have a pair of small dog trimming scissors with  rounded ends that would work well on any fishing vest.  Also I do believe fishing type forceps have a cutting edge like a pair of scissors. I usually just shred spawn bags of the hook anyhow with no problems. Couple pulls and they tear off.
